p: • Cerda, H., R. Martínez, N. Briceno, L. Pizzoferrato, P. Manzi, M. Tommaseo Ponzetta, O. Marín, and M.G. Paoletti, 2001. Palm worm: (Rhynchophorus palmarum) traditional food in Amazonas, Venezuela-nutritional composition, small scale production and tourist palatability. Ecology of Food and Nutrition, 40: 13-32.
